abstract: Bill Pennington On Pro Football column notes that defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul is back practicing with New York Giants after losing his right index finger in fireworks accident in July; says that many question how much he will be able to contribute this season.
lead_paragraph: Defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul was back at practice after losing his right index finger in a Fourth of July fireworks accident, enduring a lengthy recuperation period and signing a new one-year contract.

headline.main: Giants See a Changed Pierre-Paul on His Return
headline.print_headline: Giants See a Changed Pierre-Paul on His Return

snippet: Defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul was back at practice after losing his right index finger in a Fourth of July fireworks accident, enduring a lengthy recuperation period and signing a new one-year contract.
